name: Idle Blocks
description:
Idle Blocks is a simple idle clicker game with unique gameplay. Move your mouse over the blocks to deal damage. You can also click on the blocks or wait for an idle damage.

Destroy all blocks to complete the level and get money. Buy upgrades to deal more damage and complete more levels!

Feel stuck? Use a complex prestige system to buy super powerful permanent upgrades! Restart the game to apply purchases and you will get a fresh start, but with significantly increased powers!

GAMEPLAY

A relaxing idle clicker gameplay with various possibilities. Choose your own playthrough and spend hours with pleasure!

PRESTIGE AND UPGRADES

Complex prestige system with 12 upgrades to make your progression smooth and enjoyable

GRAPHICS

50 unique color schemes for blocks and nice pixel UI for your satisfaction

ACHIEVEMENTS

50 Steam achievements for the most hardcore players. Will you be able to collect them all?

MUSIC

28 background music tracks for your relaxation


Idle Blocks looks like a simple game, but it gives endless joy to those who dare to try it!
